messages.subject: Last two Sagara images
messages.msgSnippet: They re uploaded into totally different space, so hopefully they re more accessible.  Don t know how temporary this link will be, but for a while at least.
messages.messageBody:
They're uploaded into totally different space, so hopefully they're more accessible. Don't know how temporary this link will be, but for a while at least.

This image appears to be of some documents:
http://sozoko.tripod.com/ss16.jpg

This is the full page that had the group picture Sec posted the link to:
